name: Institute of Social Development
briefDescription: "Institute of Social Development (ISD) is an Indian social   organization registered under Indian Societies Registration Act 1860 on 18th August 2005 at Udham Singh Nagar district of Uttarakhand. Organization is actively act as a catalyst in the villages that faced the most difficulty accessing Government services and suffering from lack of health, livelihood, drinking water and sanitation facilities. The organization is working on improving mother and child health, environmental sensitization, drinking water and its management and women empowerment. ISD delivering knowledge to the farmers for healthy, nutritious and high yield agri products through its core experts group and promoting SHGs to adopt traditional trades for income generation.
